channel.title: Need help with hp glitch
channel.description:
[img]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/1181/glitchwn2.png[/img] hello im running a testcape server but somehow this is the glitch when u get higher then 99 hp say with guthans effect set or just adavnce the lvl its like when someone hits u less then 31 in my case ur hp regenerates autmatically to 130 and its like it doesnt even go down at all y is this??????if u get higher then 100 hp its like ur not even dieng is the healing timer????or the food glitch or something and also when u have like 86 hp and u wanna wat a shark till 99 it eats it but it still stays at 86 but if u eat a lobby it goes to 98
Tell me wat u think im trying to fix it whole day but it doesnt work[br][size=1]Posted at: August 22, 2006, 02:55:39 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Need help with hp glitch
